full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Supply and Delivery of a Passenger Motor Vehicle (Medium Class Truck)**
======================================================

### Tender Information

| **Field** | **Value**                                 |
| :-------- | :--------------------------------------- |
| **Reference** | WS4201587822-Doc4211650740               |
| **Solicitation** | WS4201587822                            |
| **Publication Date** | 13 September 2023                      |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 05 October 2023 14:00:00 EDT (amended) |
| **Procurement Category** | Goods – Goods and Services (GD)         |

### Description of Requirements

Parks Canada Agency (PC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a passenger motor vehicle, specifically a Medium Class Truck. The vehicle is required for use at Fort Smith, Northwest Territories. The vehicle specifications are detailed in the Statement of Requirement (Annex).

### Contracting Entity Details

* **Contracting Entity Name** | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address** | 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **Contact Person** | Jordan, Amanda (SPAC/PSPC) – [amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Tender Details

* **Tender Type** | Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method** | Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria** | Lowest Price
* **Timeline** | Proposed delivery of the vehicle at Fort Smith, Northwest Territories
* **Regions of Opportunity** | None

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date** | 13 September 2023
* **Tender Closing Date** | 05 October 2023 at 14:00:00 EDT (amended)
* **Delivery Date** | To be determined

Take note of the tender closing date, which has been amended.
